text: Ana ngankuiona yanti Allah jukuimanya yaili kumawunde ni yaili petaka? Ngaukasatamidwaga ntemela wa ŵandu ŵatatu ikaŵeje Jwalakwe jukasaŵa Jwancheche jwao, naatamuno wa ŵandu nsano ikaŵeje Jwalakwe jukasaŵa Jwansano najumo jwao, naatamuno wa ŵandu ŵakunandipila pele kapena ŵakutupila ikaŵejepe Jwalakwe jukasaŵa nao palipose pachaŵe (ni umanyilisi Wakwe wangasisika chilichose), kaneka ichindu yaŵapanginyisye tachatagulila lisiku lya Kiyama, chisimu Allah chindu chilichose aŵele Jwaachimanya chenene
